subject: Football
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Unofficially, the injured Nick Mangold is bound to cede his starting job to Colin Baxter for at least a week, just as the Jets embark on a critical and demanding stretch of road games.
snippet: Unofficially, the injured Nick Mangold is bound to cede his starting job to Colin Baxter for at least a week, just as the Jets embark on a critical and demanding stretch of road games.
